OSPAnimator

Class AbstractAActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • OSPAnimator.AbstractAActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnimActivity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmediateAActivity, MoveAActivity, PathMoveAActivity, SysBlockingAActivity

    public abstract class AbstractAActivity
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnimActivity
    AbstractAanimationActivity. Trieda, od ktorej dedia vsetky aktivity patriace triede Animator.
